body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 7, is contained in Part A of this edition. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 7 is contained in Part C of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 2007. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
IMPLEMENTATION GUIDANCE
APPENDIX Amendments to guidance on other IFRSs
